name: The 3rd Building 三教
detailed_description:
Dream? Game? Unreality? Reality? It is all because of a horror game named “The Third Building”. The game is a curse to its developers and to the third building. Play this cursed game to find the secrets.

Every college has a haunted building

This game is based on true stories from the producer. I hope I can tell my story. But after all game is not reality. The scariest thing is reality.

First Person/Third Person Mode

There are two story lines so far, “The Third Building” and “The Forth Person”. In “The Third Building” main story line, the player will act me(the producer), using first person mode. In “The Forth Person” extra story line, the player will act a mysterious woman, using third person mode. If you are trapped, try another story line. Maybe you can find the way out.

Me and My Team

We are F-Greetings Studio from UESTC, Chengdu, China. As a college student, I am clear that due to my limited experience there might be some mistakes and flows. And I have accomplished at least 85% of this game myself. As producer of this game, I accept criticism. I would appreciate it if you can give me some advice. You can contact me.


Contact


QQ group: 960671484

Weibo of the producer: Kyle_ZzZzZz

Bilibili account of producer: Kyle_ZzZzZz

Twitter: KyleZZZZhang

Thanks!!!

short_description: Dream? Game? Unreality? Reality? It is all because of a horror game named “The Third Building”. The game is a curse to its developers and to the third building. Play this cursed game to find the secrets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170或AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB或AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 可兼容DX11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060或AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 可兼容DX11

content_descriptors.notes: This is a horror game. It contains bad language, fear and violence. Some players might feel sick during the game.
